This actually works. First download the torrent then use Daemon Tools to install or to burn the CD.

Just a reminder that the CD is not the game itself just the installer so what you need to do is to download the patch. 

Go to http://www.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_the_sims_2.shtml

and download the patch . 

Although this is called NO CD patch its not actually playing without the CD. The Sims2EP1_1.mir will be extracted using rar file and mount it with Daemon Tools or burn it with CD (your choice)

Then double click the drive!!!!!!! or the Sims University. In my case it works.
